TITLE: Configuring Hangfire in OWIN Startup
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet for configuring Hangfire in an OWIN Startup file, including setting up SQL Server storage, Hangfire server, and dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
public void Configuration(IAppBuilder app)
{
    GlobalConfiguration.Configuration.UseSqlServerStorage("<connection string or its name>");
    
    app.UseHangfireServer();
    app.UseHangfireDashboard();
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Enqueuing Fire-and-Forget Task in Hangfire
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to enqueue a simple fire-and-forget task using Hangfire's BackgroundJob.Enqueue method.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
BackgroundJob.Enqueue(() => Console.WriteLine("Simple!"));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Scheduling Delayed Task in Hangfire
DESCRIPTION: Demonstration of scheduling a delayed task to be executed after a specified time interval using Hangfire's BackgroundJob.Schedule method.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
BackgroundJob.Schedule(() => Console.WriteLine("Reliable!"), TimeSpan.FromDays(7));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Recurring Task in Hangfire
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting up a recurring task using Hangfire's RecurringJob.AddOrUpdate method with a CRON expression.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
RecurringJob.AddOrUpdate(() => Console.WriteLine("Transparent!"), Cron.Daily);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Job Continuations in Hangfire
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet demonstrating how to create job continuations, where one job is executed after the completion of another.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var id = BackgroundJob.Enqueue(() => Console.WriteLine("Hello, "));
BackgroundJob.ContinueWith(id, () => Console.WriteLine("world!"));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Hangfire Server in Console Application
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to run a Hangfire server in a console application or other non-web environments using BackgroundJobServer.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
using (new BackgroundJobServer())
{
    Console.WriteLine("Hangfire Server started. Press ENTER to exit...");
    Console.ReadLine();
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Hangfire Server in Web Application
DESCRIPTION: Simple code to start a Hangfire server within a web application using the UseHangfireServer method.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
app.UseHangfireServer();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Hangfire via NuGet Package Manager
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Hangfire using the NuGet Package Console in Visual Studio.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
PM> Install-Package Hangfire
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using stdump to capture stack traces in Hangfire troubleshooting
DESCRIPTION: Command line example showing how to use the stdump utility to capture stack traces from a running w3wp process without interrupting it. This is useful for diagnosing stuck background processing in Hangfire.
SOURCE: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Hangfire/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
stdump w3wp > stacktrace.txt
```
